description:
Kaiba’s about to finish off Noa, but Mokuba protects Noa from his final blow!  Will Kaiba not forgive this treachery and sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom from Noa’s cyber prison, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable under rocky circumstances?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mokuba o Sukue! Unmei no Dai Nana Turn
モクバを救え! 運命の第七ターン
